Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th Central Park-Kedzie
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are rrtd in both directions via 26th, Central Park, 31st, Kedzie and 26th route due to police activity near 26th Central Park-Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Central Park, 31st, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 26th.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity at 26th Central Park-Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
